title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.489 - Remedial measures: cast iron and ductile iron pipelines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.489 - Remedial measures: cast iron and ductile iron pipelines

State Regulations
(a) Each segment of cast iron or ductile iron
pipe on which general graphitization is found to a degree where a fracture or
any leakage might result, must be replaced. (b) Each segment of cast iron or ductile iron
pipe on which localized graphitization is found to a degree where any leakage
might result, must be replaced or repaired, or sealed by internal sealing
methods adequate to prevent or arrest any leakage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.489

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
